title: Goethe, Science, and Sophiology with John Vervaeke, and Michael Martin
description:
I brought John Vervaeke and Michael Martin together to discuss the connection I was seeing with their work.  We used Goethe's approach to science as a springboard for a wide ranging conversation.  I mostly don't interrupt, but I do contribute a few things. 

John's Channel 

https://www.youtube.com/user/johnvervaeke

Michael's Website

https://www.thecenterforsophiologicalstudies.com/

Books Mentioned:

https://www.amazon.com/Incarnation-Poetic-Word-Theological-Philosophical/dp/1621382397/ref=pd_lpo_sbs_14_img_1?_encoding=UTF8&psc=1&refRID=JPD40X65BDG41W59MQMK

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1621384233/ref=dbs_a_def_rwt_bibl_vppi_i8

https://www.amazon.com/Submerged-Reality-Sophiology-Poetic-Metaphysics/dp/1621381137
